dmca.title: A Steal from the Reel
dmca.body:
To: [Recipient]

 

It has come to our attention that your website, www.millstreampressinc.com, is using material copied verbatim (from our website, www.1printingsource.com (the "Property") in spite of the fact that it is obviously our intellectual property.  As you know or should know, such misappropriation and use in competitive commerce of our intellectual property is a clear violation of the copyright laws of the United States of America and the unfair competition and predatory trade practices laws of both the United States of America and the State of California.  Demand is hereby made that you and your affiliates immediately cease and desist from any further use of the Property and that you promptly deliver to us duly executed and notarized affidavits which represent under penalty of perjury that all such use has ceased and that you and your affiliates will hereafter forever desist from any such use or any other use of any of our other intellectual property. 

 

            You have already subjected yourself and any companies and individuals, who have at any time designed, provided servers for, transmitted and/or hosted your website, operating or otherwise involved in such illegal acts to liability for damages (including statutory treble and other damages, legal interest, court costs and reimbursement of attorney
